components.description: Schwinn N'Litened aluminum with Comfort-Tuned geometry and replaceable derailleur hanger.
Alex ACE 17 double wall alloy with 32 holes
Schwinn Bio Tuned Ergonomic dual density
Resin comfort pedal with steel axle
Alloy quill style with adjustable rise
Comfort Tuned Plus two-tone with Schwinn Super Soft foam and coil spring rails
Alloy suspension with micro adjustment clamp
